text:
A good idea for HubSpot improvement would be to allow us creating a custom sitemap. Google News needs a specific sitemap and just having one on HubSpot is not enough. I have a client that needs to have two sitemaps and customize them.

<@U2H3TT8F2> do you know if HubSpot already think about this feature ? And do you already met this issue ?

I dont believe HubSpot has mentioned anything about a feature like this. I haven't run into anything yet where I would need to do this. I am unsure if you might be able to use a static file in the File Manager (naturally you would have to update it manually though) for the meantime but I think it's fed something worth looking into.
